About Me

Let me tell you a little about myself

My Journey

I have always had a passion for creating as well helping others. In my college journey I took an interest in many different areas such as creative writing, journalism, nursing and science. I eventually took an intro Java course and realized my passion for programming and logic-based activities.


I decided to major in Computer Science and discovered UX/UI design/development and really enjoyed it. I completed a couple of internships, but upon graduating college I found it difficult to find a job. So I decided to take some time away from programming and dipped my toes into the real estate business. My passion for front-end development still remained, so in the past few months I have been creating the projects you see here, as well as taking online courses to stay up-to-date on the lastest technologies and languages.
